name: graduation
content: As an undergraduate student, I developed a strong foundation in Computer Science. My coursework and projects helped me enhance my problem-solving and logical reasoning skills, particularly in areas like algorithms, programming, and system design. Engaging with computational challenges has been a fulfilling way to exercise my analytical thinking and technical expertise.

name: post-graduation
content: As an MCA student, I have expertise in web development using the MERN stack and backend technologies like Node.js, Express.js, and MongoDB. I also have experience in data science, including data analysis and machine learning with Python. Additionally, I am skilled in C++ and problem-solving using Data Structures and Algorithms.
